sourcesContent: export function getDmgTypeIcon(dmgType){ let icon = '' switch(dmgType){ case 'melee': icon = '' break case 'cold': icon = '' break case 'fire': icon = '' break case 'lightning': icon = '' break case 'magic': icon = '' break case 'acid': icon = '' break case 'necrotic': icon = '' break case 'poison': icon = '' break case 'psychic': icon = '' break case 'radiant': icon = '' break } return icon } export function getItemIcon(itemType){ let icon = '' switch(itemType){ case 'mainHand': icon = '' break case 'offHand': icon = '' break case 'accessory': icon = '' break case 'armor': icon = '' break case 'cloak': icon = '' break case 'consumable': icon = '' break case 'key': icon = '' break default: icon = '' break } return icon }
